thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Centralcon Investment Holding to sell stake and creditor's rights in Centralcon Investment Holding(Hong Kong) for totaling HK$2.15 bln

title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Centralcon Investment Holding to sell stake and creditor's rights in Centralcon Investment Holding(Hong Kong) for totaling HK$2.15 bln

text:
